member.name: T:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg
member.summary: This type describes the configuration that this program can handle.

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.Verbosity
member.summary: Determines how verbose this program is. A setting of 0 disables all output. A setting of 1 disables all stdout output and will only write to stderr. A setting of 2 enables the most basic info on stdout (writes to stderr as usual). A setting of 3+ enables more verbose info on stdout (writes to stderr as usual).

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.Force
member.summary: If this is set to true, the program will try to create the target directory.

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.CleverCopyDirectoryName
member.summary: The name of the directory in which this program stores its own data.

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.SourceDirectory
member.summary: The source directory in which to enumerate files that this program shall copy to .

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.IncludeGlobs
member.summary: The optional globs to include, with respect to , as supported by [Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing). If none are provided, the default globbing pattern is **/* - i.e. all files.

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.ExcludeGlobs
member.summary: The optional globs to exclude, with respect to , as supported by [Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing). If none are provided, the default is to exclude - i.e. only this program's files will be excluded. I.e. this program's files will always be excluded, regardless of what is defined in this setting.

member.name: P:CleverCopy.ProgramCfg.TargetDirectory
member.summary: The target directory that this program will copy files to.
